author: zeroxmxi
body:
Powershell ISE in Elevated/non-elevated mode.

Intellisense worked but the autocomplete list does not show up.

See attached picture.

Surrounded in red rectangle, a dot appears to be the pixel draw of the autocomplete list but nothing shows up.

Name                           Value

----                           -----

PSVersion                      5.1.17134.1

PSEdition                      Desktop

PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}

BuildVersion                   10.0.17134.1

CLRVersion                     4.0.30319.42000

WSManStackVersion              3.0

PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3

SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
![autocomplete-list-not-showing](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/11497291/39611163-38cbe66c-4f88-11e8-959a-2468eb8c5208.png)

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: ISE is not in the repo. Please report on UserVoice.

comments.author: NJ-Dude
comments.body: This issue occurs in Win 10 after upgrading to version 1803 (April Upgrade)

comments.author: ghost
comments.body: Same issue for me as well.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body: This issue has been marked as external and has not had any activity for **1 day**. It has been be closed for housekeeping purposes.

title: Autocomplete list not showing
